code: @Manual{,   title = {shiny.omicron: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)},   author = {{Jacob Clarke}},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000}, }

what: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: Shiny omicron provides insights evolution different omicron strains country time. dashboard made three tabs: -Country Maps Heatmaps

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: -country preview -Country tab allows users select country interest visualize development omicron strains time.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: maps preview Maps tab can used visualize spread omicron dominant variant variant country interest. provides date slider choose week interest. variant map type displays dominant variant country. variant map type allows users select variant interest view percentage country. Percentages binned quintiles 0-19.9, 20-39.9, 40-59.9, 60-79.9, 80-100.

title: What the Package Does (One Line, Title Case)
text: maps preview Heatmaps tab provides multiple heatmaps view spread omicron variants. country heatmap requires users select variant interest. resulting heatmap shows percentage specified variant part variants changes time country. variant heatmap shows globally percentage variant changed time.
